body: Good art is not wasted, even on NTR, if it serves to make the work hotter. Good art is wasted when an artist's conscience distracts them from what the real point is.

If there wasn't a Netorare tag I wouldn't've known. My definition of Netorare is when a man or son are mentally and emotionally destroyed or when the woman says horrible shit about her so called love and or son directly or indirectly.

P.S. I hate netorare and I hate good art being wasted on netorare even more.
